## Guide
- *Scroll* to zoom
- *Drag* to move around
- *Hover* or *tap* icons and connections for more info
- Use the *drop down menu* to select highlight particular nodes


The lines represent:

<span style="color: red;"> &horbar; government contracts</span> \
<span style="color: blue;">&horbar; political donations</span> \
<span style="color: grey;">&horbar; other connections (e.g. family/employment)</span> 

   
Thicker lines indicate more valuable contracts or donations.
